Faithia Williams (amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 5, 1971) bụ onye Naijiria n'eme ihe nkiri, onye n'eme ihe nkiri, onye n'emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.

A mụrụ Faithia onye si na Delta Steeti na Ikeja n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1971. A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ anụrụ ọtụtụ nwanyị ebe amụtara ụmụ itoolu. Faithia gara Maryland Primary School nakwa Maryland Comprehensive Secondary School dị na  Lagos Steeti
Ọ nwetara asambodo West African School Certificate na Maryland Comprehensive Secondary School
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kwara State Polytechnic maka asambodo diplọma. N'afọ 2016, Faithia natara nnabata na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo iji mụọ ihe nkiri.
Faithia ghọrọ onye n'eme ihe nkiri na mberede

Nwanne nna Faithia, Alhaji Fatai Teniola, gwara ya ka ọ nọchie anya onye n'eme ihe nkiri nke n'apụtaghị n'otu n'ime mmepụta nke ihe nkiri ha. Williams rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri "Ta lo pa chief". Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, mepụta, ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ

N'afọ 2008, ọ meriri na Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye n'eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma ọzọkwa ihe nkiri ya bụ Iranse Aje meriri dị kaihe nkiri kachasị nma n'ihe nkiri obodo n'afọ ahụ. N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, ọ meriri na Africa Movie Academy Award, ebe ọ pụtara dị ka onye kachasị mma nime ndị n'eme ihe nkiri nke afọ ahụ ya nakwa Odunlade Adekola onye pụtara dị ka Onye kachasị nma na ndị n'eme egwuregwu n'afọ ahụ. O nwetakwara ihe nrite Best Indigenous Language maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ n'ihe nkiri "Iya Alalake" n'afọ 2015 Africa Magic Viewers Tian Choice Awards
Williams lụrụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, Saheed Balogun, onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ abụọ, otu nwa nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị. Fathia nwekwara nwa nwoke site na mmekọrịta mbụ ya.
